config.name: nivea_loading_unloading
config.label: Loading/Unloading platform should be next to entry/exit gate of DB, such that stocks are directly transported in and out of vehicles with no trans shipment in-between. Manpower involved in movement of stocks must ensure proper handling while loading and unloading

config.name: nivea_loading_unloading_avatar's
config.label: Loading/Unloading platform avatar's

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remark_loading_unloading
config.label: Remarks for not having recommended loading/unloading platform

config.name: nivea_facility
config.label: Facility should be sufficiently elevated from ground level to prevent direct access to pests/dirt/dust/rain water and water overflow etc. Entry points should be guarded to ensure no dust or pest enter storage area - e.g. PVC curtains or air curtains on entry/exit doors and fine mesh on windows, ventilators and other opening

config.name: nivea_facility_evaluated_ground
config.label: Facility in elevated ground avatars

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remark_for_not_faclity
config.label: Remarks for not having recommended loading/unloading platform

config.name: nivea_gaps_holes_facility
config.label: There should be no holes/gaps seen in the facility (e.g gaps under doors, shutters, windows, ventilators, holes in wall etc

config.name: nivea_noholes_nogaps_avatar
config.label: No holes or gaps in facility images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remark_for_gaps_facility
config.label: Remarks for holes & gaps in facility

config.name: nivea_washroom_loacated
config.label: Washrooms should be located outside, away from storage area. In case washroom facility is nearby, it should be neatly maintained. No seepage or water ingress should happen from washroom doors, windows, ventilators or its walls into storage area

config.name: nivea_washroom_located_avatars
config.label: Nivea washrooms located outside faclity images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_no_washrooms
config.label: Remarks for not maintaining washroom conditions

config.name: nivea_smooth_wellpainted_walls
config.label: Walls should be smooth and well painted. There should not be any paint peeling, or greasy and dirty sports on walls which affect cartons. There should be no marks of wall paints on cartons

config.name: nivea_smooth_painted_avatars
config.label: Smoothly finished and well painted walls - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_no_paintedwalls
config.label: Remarks for not having proper wall conditions

config.name: nivea_lighiting_availability
config.label: Lights should be available throughout the storage area including overhead storage's, shelves, racks etc such that product can be traced, inspected and labels can be read at the location within storage room. All walkways, entry/exit points and loading unloading bays should be well lit

config.name: nivea_storageunit_light_avatars
config.label: Storage unit lighting conditions - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_not_proper_lights
config.label: Remarks for not having proper lighting conditions

config.name: nivea_height_of_storage_area
config.label: Height of storage area should be sufficient to allow stacking of stocks to recommended height, i.e. to allow easy in and out movement of both man and material. In case shelves are used for storage, the carton orientation should be correct, height should be less than maximum allowed stack height mentioned on cartons and such that the top cartons do not touch the roof/ next shelf, this is to ensure no damage while moving stocks

config.name: nivea_height_storage_avatars
config.label: Storage area height conditions - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_not_having_proper_height
config.label: Remarks for not having sufficient storage height conditions

config.name: nivea_walls_without_darkness_flaking
config.label: There should be no dampness/soggy feel on walls. There should be no flaking or mold growth on walls due to moisture Cartons in storage area should not feel damp or soggy

config.name: nivea_walls_without_damage_avatars
config.label: Walls without dampness/flaking/mold growths - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_reamark_for_dampness
config.label: Remarks for dampness/flaking/mold growth conditions on walls

config.name: nivea_all_stocks_arranged
config.label: All NIVEA stocks, salable and non salable stocks should be kept separate from each other and clearly identifiable. In case of shared storage in same floor, there should a dedicated room for NIVEA stocks. In case stocks of multiple companies are kept in same room due to very less quantity, stocks must be physically separated using racks or physical partitions and no stock mix up should be observed

config.name: nivea_all_stocks_avatars
config.label: Nivea stocks arranged and identifiable - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_for_not_arranging_properly
config.label: Remarks for not arranging nivea stocks clearly

config.name: nivea_storage_gaps_overcrowding
config.label: The storage area should be sufficient to allow proper stacking and ensure sufficient gaps is maintained between different clients and kind of stocks, i.e. no overcrowding is present which leads to mix up and part of stocks not accessible

config.name: nivea_proper_staking_storage_with_gaps
config.label: Proper stacking in storage with gaps - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_no_proper_stacking
config.label: Remarks for no proper stacking with gaps

config.name: nivea_distributor_secured_lock
config.label: Distributor premise should be secured with lock and key facility. In case multiple access routes are present, the routes not in use should be permanently sealed and entry exit routes must be secured with lock and key arrangement during non operational hours. Entry exit doors should be of solid wood/metal with no gaps in between door and frame

config.name: nivea_distributor_strong_locks_avatars
config.label: Distributor premise with strong locks - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_no_strong_locks
config.label: Remarks for not having proper security measures

config.name: nivea_cctv_cemeras
config.label: Preferably, additional security measures like CCTV camera's and/or security guards should be put in place to ensure stock security during both operational and non operational hours. In case of security guard, they should be placed at all active entry/exit routes and storage of NIVEA stocks as per operational/ non operational hours. In case of CCTV, complete route of entry and exit including storage of NIVEA stocks should be covered and sufficient recording backup (preferably 1 month min) must be available to enable review in case of any incident

config.name: nivea_cctv_cemeras_avatars
config.label: Additional security with CC cameras, security personnel - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_no_cctv
config.label: Remarks for not having additional security measures

config.name: nivea_mesurements_prevent_rain_floods
config.label: In case of a previous incident at the distributor (e.g. fire, flood water, torrential rain etc) which could potentially result in damage to the stocks, the current situation should have concrete actions in place and implemented to ensure stocks are secured from any such incident(s) in future? Note - In case there is no history of any such event, evaluate whether the current infrastructure will provide security towards any such incident(s) in future or not.

config.name: nivea_mesurements_taken_avatar
config.label: Measures taken to prevent rain, flood, fire incidents - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_no_measurements
config.label: Remarks for no measures to prevent rain, flood, fire incidents

config.name: nivea_adequate_fire_extinguishers
config.label: Adequate number of fire extinguishers should be available at distributor. All available fire extinguishers should have valid shelf life always and timely refilling/replacement should be done

config.name: nivea_adequate_fire_extinguishers_avatars
config.label: Adequate number of fire extinguisher/s - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_no_fire_extinguishers
config.label: Remarks for not having additional security measures

config.name: nivea_cartoons_stored
config.label: Check how cartons are stored - Storage should be product wise and should enable product wise identification - In case of storage constraint, heavier cartons should be placed on bottom and lighter on top - There should be no damage to cartons due to stacking practices (e.g. bending/buckling etc.) - Open cartons should be placed independently on top to avoid damage

config.name: nivea_cartoons_stored_avatars
config.label: Cartons stored - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_not_storing_cartoons
config.label: Remarks for not storing cartons correctly

config.name: nivea_bulking_of_cartons
config.label: There should be no buckling of cartons - Stack of cartons should not be sagging to one side. - Products must be stacked neatly in a brick/block/pin wheel pattern layer ensuring strength of stack. - No damage due to improper storage or handling and stacking practices - All stacks should be straight and in proper manner to ensure cartons do not get damaged - No loose products should be stored in open.

config.name: nivea_no_bulking_carton_avatars
config.label: No Buckling of carton images - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_bulking
config.label: Remarks for buckling of cartons

config.name: nivea_cartons_bulked_damaged
config.label: In case cartons get buckled/damaged, they should be either replaced on placed on top to avoid further damages - Similarly all half-empty cartons should be kept on top to avoid further damages.

config.name: nivea_cartons_get_bulked_damaged_avatars
config.label: In case cartons get buckled/damaged, they should be either replaced or placed on top to avoid further damage - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_not_storing_damage_cart_on_top
config.label: Remarks for not storing damaged cartons on top

config.name: nivea_loose_half_empty_cartons
config.label: Access to loose/half empty cartons should be controlled- Only one carton should be open at a time for one NART, multiple open cartons of same NART should not be there.

config.name: nivea_loose_half_empty_cartons_avatars
config.label: Nivea washrooms located outside faclity images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_not_controlling_loose_cartons
config.label: Remarks for not maintaining washroom conditions

config.name: nivea_bd_loactions
config.label: Loose stocks must be avoided at all DB locations. - At DB, all stocks should be either in cartons, covered crates or in shrink (applicable only for fully shrinked stocks and where some pieces are dispensed)- Racks used for storage should be clean, no dust, rusting etc - If crates are used for stock storage, they should be clean

config.name: nivea_loose_stock_db_avatars
config.label: Loose stocks must be avoided at all DB locations - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_for_not_avoding_loose_stocks
config.label: Remarks for not avoiding loose stocks at all locations

config.name: nivea_fifo_maintained_stocks
config.label: FEFO (First Expiry First Out) should be maintained for stocks - Pick few products with highest volume and few with lowest volume.- Check for stock qty and batch wise qty, match same with physical stock Note - FEFO (First Expiry First Out) is different from FIFO (First In First Out).- FEFO is based on expiry and batches which expire first should go to market first.

config.name: nivea_fefo_maintained_for_stocks_avatars
config.label: FEFO maintained for stocks - image

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_not_maintaining_fefo_for_stocks
config.label: Remarks for not maintaining FEFO for stocks

config.name: nivea_damaged_rejected_expired_stocks
config.label: Check where damaged/rejected/expired and non-salable stocks are kept - Such stocks should be kept physically segregated from salable stocks,i.e. separate location with physical demarcation - No mix up should be observed in such stocks - i.e. no salable pieces should be mixed with such stocks - All non salable stocks must be clearly identified by category type (damage, rejected, returns, expiry etc) - All non salable stocks must be clearly identified by product type and stock details must be maintained for individual carton - Storage condition of all non salable stocks should ensure no further deterioration or damage happens to such stocks

config.name: nivea_damaged_rejected_expired_stocks_avatar
config.label: Place where damaged, rejected, expired and non-salable stocks are kept - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_not_maintaining_standards_stocks
config.label: Remarks for not maintaining standards for storing damaged/rejeted/expired stocks

config.name: nivea_co_stored_nivea_stocks
config.label: Below products should not be co-stored along with NIVEA stocks - Inflammable or heavy smelling products (e.g Chemicals/Paints/Brittle items like glasses/tube lights/Oils/Fuels/Batteries, e.t.c

config.name: nivea_inflammable_smelly_products_avatar
config.label: Inflammable/Smelly products not be co-stored with or alongside NIVEA stocks - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remark_keeping_inflammable_smelly
config.label: Remarks for keeping inflammable/smelly products with NIVEA stocks

config.name: nivea_stock_walls_on_roof
config.label: Stocks should be kept away from walls and roof - i.e. stocks should not touch walls and roof during storage - There should be clear gap/identification between different stocks of Product wise

config.name: nivea_stock_kept_on_roof_avatar
config.label: Stocks should be kept away from walls and roof - image

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remark_not_keeping_stock_away_from_walls
config.label: Remarks for not keeping stocks away from walls and roof

config.name: nivea_stored_on_pallets_good_quality
config.label: Stocks should be stored on pallets or good Quality intact tarpaulin - images

config.name: nivea_stored_on_pallets_good_quality_avatar
config.label: Stocks should be stored on pallets or good Quality intact tarpaulin - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_no_pallets_good_quality
config.label: Remarks for no pallets good quality

config.name: nivea_cartons_should_stacked_as_height
config.label: Cartons should be stacked as per staking height mentioned on same. - No over staking should be done over and above recommended stack height. - Cartons should be kept in upright direction, indicated by arrow mark on each carton. - No cartons should be placed in inverted or side wards orientation

config.name: nivea_cartons_should_stacked_as_height_avatar
config.label: Cartons should be stacked as per staking height mentioned - images

validate.message: Upload Images, in PNG, JPG, JPEG

config.name: nivea_remarks_not_storing_stacks_as_height
config.label: Remarks for not storing stacks as per staking height

config.name: nivea_db_and_no_damange
config.label: Check stocks available at DB and no damage should be observed in stocks

config.name: nivea_db_and_no_damange_avatar
